title: Phase 8: Distribution (CI, binary releases)
description: cargo install from git. GitHub Actions CI (macOS-arm64, linux-x64). cargo-dist for binary releases. Update README/CLAUDE.md for Rust project.

logs.msg: Old Python CI/release workflows deleted. Need new Rust CI (cargo build/test/clippy) and cargo-dist release workflow. GitHub has 1 low dependabot alert.
Created .github/workflows/ci.yml with build/test/clippy. Handles path dep with skip logic.
